title: How to Make Simple Peas Pulao

steps.headline: Add the ghee to the pressure cooker.
Add crushed black and green cardamoms.
Add the sliced onions and mix well.
Add garam masala and mix well.
Stir fry the onions till they turn a dark brown color.
Add the rice and fresh peas.
Mix all of the ingredients together.
Cover the lid of the pressure cooker.
steps.description: Cook under pressure until there are two whistles. Turn off the heat. Alternatively, read the instructions accompanying your pressure cooker and use the timing or signals it suggests. See Tips below for timing suggestions if not using an Indian pressure cooker.

steps.headline: Open the lid of the pressure cooker.
Mix the cooked pulao with the ladle very lightly.
steps.description: Take care not to crush the rice grains.

steps.headline: Serve the pulao with the raita.

text: Add the ghee to the pressure cooker.  Add crushed black and green cardamoms.  Saute the ingredients.  Add the sliced onions and mix well.  Add salt and mix well.  Add garam masala and mix well.  Stir fry the onions till they turn a dark brown color.  Add the rice and fresh peas.  Mix all of the ingredients together.  Add water and mix well.  Cover the lid of the pressure cooker. Cook under pressure until there are two whistles. Turn off the heat. Alternatively, read the instructions accompanying your pressure cooker and use the timing or signals it suggests. See Tips below for timing suggestions if not using an Indian pressure cooker. Open the lid of the pressure cooker.  Mix the cooked pulao with the ladle very lightly. Take care not to crush the rice grains. Serve the pulao with the raita.
